author: dag
msg: DERBY-673: Get rid of the NodeFactory
Followup fix to patch derby-673-typesafe-lists-2. The patch introduced
an issue causing ConcurrentModificationException. Roll back that change.

author: violetagg
msg: When calculating the path in AsyncContext.dispatch(), methods ServletRequest.getRequestURI and ServletRequest.getContextPath cannot be used. That's because the first one returns a string that is not decoded and not normalized, but the second one returns decoded string. Instead of this methods ServletRequest.getServletPath and ServletRequest.getPathInfo will be used as requestURI = contextPath + servletPath + pathInfo.

author: fhopf
msg: ODFTOOLKIT-365: renamed profile that builds download artifacts to allow parallel deployments to maven

msg: Attempting to get a build working, adding a missing file to Netty transport
